mapper.update: INSERT INTO T_APPROVAL_M (APPR_DIVS_CD, APPR_REF_NO, APPR_NM, FOR_APPR_EMP_NO, FOR_APPR_DTM, APPR_STUS_CD, FOR_APPR_CNTN, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES (#{appr_divs_cd}, #{appr_ref_no}, #{appr_nm}, #{emp_no}, now(), '0001', #{for_appr_cntn}, now(), #{regId}, now(), #{regId})

INSERT INTO T_APPROVAL_SIGN_D (APPR_NO, APPR_SIGN_SEQ, APPR_SIGN_EMP_NO, APPR_STUS_CD, APPR_SIGN_DTM, APPR_SIGN_CNTN, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM, DATA_UPD_ID) VALUES (#{appr_no}, #{appr_sign_seq}, #{appr_sign_emp_no}, '0001', now(), '', now(), #{regId}, now(), #{regId})

INSERT INTO T_APPROVAL_APND_FILE_D (APPR_NO, APND_FILE_DIVS_CD, REG_FOLDER_NM, REG_FILE_NM, DATA_REG_DTM, DATA_REG_ID, DATA_UPD_DTM,DATA_UPD_ID ) VALUES ( #{appr_no}, #{apnd_file_divs_cd}, #{reg_folder_nm}, #{reg_file_nm}, now(), #{login_id}, now(), #{login_id})
mapper.select: SELECT EMP_NO, EMP_NM FROM T_EMP_M WHERE DEPT_NO= #{dept_no} AND EMP_GRD_CD='0003' UNION ALL SELECT B.EMP_NO, B.EMP_NM FROM T_DEPT_EMP_REL_D A , T_EMP_M B WHERE A.DEPT_NO= #{dept_no} AND A.EMP_NO = B.EMP_NO AND B.EMP_GRD_CD NOT IN ('0003','0004')

SELECT TAM.APPR_NO, TAM.APPR_DIVS_CD, (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00026' AND E.CMM_CD = TAM.APPR_DIVS_CD) AS APPR_DIVS_CD_NM, CASE WHEN TAM.APPR_DIVS_CD = '0001' THEN (SELECT VENDOR_NM FROM T_VENDOR_M WHERE VENDOR_NO = TAM.APPR_REF_NO ) WHEN TAM.APPR_DIVS_CD = '0002' THEN (SELECT PRPS_NM FROM T_PROPOSAL_M WHERE PRPS_ID = TAM.APPR_REF_NO ) ELSE '' END AS APPR_REF_NM, APPR_REF_NO, TAM.APPR_NM , TAM.APPR_STUS_CD, TAM.FOR_APPR_CNTN FROM T_APPROVAL_M TAM WHERE TAM.APPR_NO = #{appr_no}

SELECT TAGD.APPR_SIGN_EMP_NO, TEM.EMP_NM , (SELECT E.CMM_CD_NM FROM T_CMM_CD_M E WHERE E.CMM_CD_GRP_ID='00027' AND E.CMM_CD = TAGD.APPR_STUS_CD) AS APPR_STUTS_CD_NM FROM T_APPROVAL_SIGN_D TAGD , T_EMP_M TEM WHERE TAGD.APPR_NO =#{appr_no} AND TAGD.APPR_SIGN_EMP_NO = TEM.EMP_NO ORDER BY TAGD.APPR_SIGN_SEQ
